snippet: In the latest release of the 7 News/Suffolk University tracking poll, 40 percent said they planned to vote for or leaned toward Mr. Romney, 17 percent backed Mr. Paul and 11 percent chose Mr. Santorum.
abstract: In the latest release of the 7 News/Suffolk University tracking poll, 40 percent said they planned to vote for or leaned toward Mr. Romney, 17 percent backed Mr. Paul and 11 percent chose Mr. Santorum.

headline.main: Romney Keeps Steady Lead in New Hampshire
